name: Furry Knight Break
storyline:
Neuer, a country where Furries live happily.
One day, the world faced an unprecedented crisis by the breakout of a large number of monsters with curses.

The Adventurers could not take off their cursed armor any longer and were suffered from fleas and lice. They could not even sleep.

As a blacksmith apprentice, it will be only you who can break the curses to save the Furry Knights out of the armor to regain the peaceful sleep!
summary: Furry Knight Break is an action puzzle game.
